code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{flatDeep,slugify,containsObject}from'../../../utils';import PostData from'../../../data/blog/PostData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoryOne=props=>{const cats=PostData.map(item=>{return item.categories;});let singleCatArray=flatDeep(cats);let categories=[];singleCatArray.forEach(cat=>{const obj={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:1};const objIndex=containsObject(obj,categories);if(objIndex!==-1){const prevCount=categories[objIndex].count;categories[objIndex]={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:prevCount+1};}else{categories.push(obj);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`${props.style2==='enable'?'-2':''} widget widget_categories ${props.extraClass||''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"widget-title",children:"Categories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"category-list",children:categories.slice(0,5).map(cat=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"cat-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"#",children:cat.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["(",cat.count,")"]})]},cat.slug);})})]});};export default CategoryOne;
